author: Reuters Editorial
title: Pompeo: Regime change not U.S. objective in dealings with Iran
text:
May 24, 2018 / 2:54 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago Pompeo: Regime change not U.S. objective in dealings with Iran Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said on Thursday that regime change is not a U.S. objective in dealings with Iran. U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo listens to China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi during a joint news conference after their meeting at the State Department in Washington, U.S., May 23, 2018. REUTERS/Yuri Gripas
He responded, “No,” when asked at a U.S. Senate hearing whether Washington was seeking regime change in the country. Reporting by Patricia Zengerle; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama
